resources.string: Ramadan is the ninth (9th) month of the Islamic Lunar Calender
Ramadan is the month in which the Holy Book was revealed
There is a night inside Ramadan better than a thousand month. It is called Layl latul Qadir (Nighth of Power)
Deeds done in Ramadan are rewarded in multiple fold.
Gates of hell is locked during Ramadan while all Gates of paradise are opened.
